actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 102-79, by Mr. Frost.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2427. The resolution waives certain points of order against consideration of the bill. Measure will be read by sectio n. Bill is open to amendments. It shall be in order to consid er the amendment printed in the report o f the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution, if offered by Mr. Yates or his designee and all points of order against said amendment fo r failure to comply with the provisions of clause 2 of rule XXI are hereby waiv ed.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 22.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Waiving certain points of order during consideration of the bill (H.R. 2427) making appropriations for energy and water development for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1992, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 2427 (energy and water development funding).

titles.title: Waiving certain points of order during consideration of the bill (H.R. 2427) making appropriations for energy and water development for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1992, and for other purposes.
